events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position in our backend team.
The application has been categorized under the engineering cluster due to the candidate's experience as a software developer.
A recruiter has been assigned to this candidate to coordinate the upcoming steps and ensure a smooth process.
The initial screening call was completed and the candidate showed strong knowledge in software development principles.
The candidate confirmed availability for the technical interview and expressed enthusiasm about the opportunity.
The technical interview has been scheduled for 2024-05-07 at 15:00 UTC with the engineering panel.
The candidate successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong problem-solving skills and code quality.
HR interview has been scheduled with the candidate to discuss company culture and benefits on 2024-05-09.
The HR interview was completed positively; the candidate aligned well with company values and team expectations.
An offer has been proposed to the candidate including competitive salary and benefits backed by managerial approval.
The candidate responded positively to the offer and asked minor questions about the onboarding process.
The candidate has accepted the job offer and is excited to join the software engineering team at our company.
Onboarding has started with the candidate completing all required paperwork and attending orientation sessions.
The hiring process is officially closed with the candidate fully integrated into the engineering team and productive.
